title: [K-12] Short-Term Course for Strengthening Learning Competencies Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer application skills and experience using LMS systems
context.additional_context: Focuses on self-directed learning strategies using generative AI in blended learning environments, cultivating practical application skills through social domain case analyses. Learning outcomes are measured through summative assessments.

learning_goals: Develop the competency to analyze and summarize social science assignments using generative AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Gemini).

Learners will understand three ethical principles for generative AI use in blended learning environments (face-to-face/remote/flexible learning), such as source attribution, bias review, and personal information protection. They will create a checklist to evaluate the application of these principles in two real-world cases.
Apply a process for critically evaluating and improving AI-generated content on LMS platforms.

resources: Generative AI Tool Free Trial Account

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
